statements: SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM authorized_devices WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.0';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE last_checkin < current_timestamp - interval '1 day';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM authorized_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, firmware_version FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Device%' ORDER BY ip_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_name = 'Device A';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM authorized_devices WHERE firmware_version NOT LIKE '%beta%';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version, last_checkin FROM authorized_devices ORDER BY last_checkin DESC;
SELECT COUNT(device_id) AS total_devices, MAX(firmware_version) AS latest_firmware FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT config_id, config_name, config_value FROM device_configurations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_ip_address FROM authorized_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_configurations WHERE config_name LIKE '%default%';
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM device_configurations WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY config_name DESC;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM device_configurations WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY config_id ASC;
SELECT d.device_id, d.device_name, c.config_name FROM authorized_devices d JOIN device_configurations c ON d.device_id = c.device_id;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_ip_address LIKE '192.%';
SELECT * FROM device_configurations ORDER BY configuration_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE device_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT device_id, configuration_name, configuration_details FROM device_configurations WHERE config_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, device_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level >= 2 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_config FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM authorized_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%PC%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM authorized_devices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id;
SELECT u.username, ud.device_name FROM users u JOIN authorized_devices ud ON u.user_id = ud.device_id;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_type='Mobile';
SELECT device_name, device_type, configuration FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_id=1;
SELECT * FROM device_types ORDER BY type_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_description, event_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE device_id=3;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT type_name, description FROM device_types WHERE type_id = 2;
SELECT config_name, config_value FROM device_configurations WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY config_name ASC;
SELECT event_type, event_description, event_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_type, network_address FROM network_configurations WHERE network_id = 4;
